title: Certificate for jury pay
context: ยง612-9 Certificate for jury pay. At least once each month, the clerk shall certify the number of days each juror or prospective juror has attended court and the amount due to the juror or prospective juror. [L 1973, c 191, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985; am L 2007, c 122, ยง6]
